My Little Pop Icons by Mari Kasurinen

By in category


My Little Princess Leia

I come from the generation of My Little Pony so when I saw these sculptures by Mari Kasurinen, I knew that those of you who were also 80s children would understand.


My Little Storm Trooper


My *Little Lady Gaga (#2)***


My *Little Edward Scissorhands***


My *Little Batman***


My *Little Spock***


My *Little Ironman***

About us

Hypenotic is a marketing strategy, design & development firm that chooses to use its powers for good. We’re a certified founding member of B Corp in Canada. Since ’98, we’ve helped a lot of interesting people do important things. We create relevant communications and useful experiences. Find out more.
